Usage pls work¶

It’s very easy, play something on Spotify and just run this in your terminal:

$ swaglyrics -c

The -c flag stands for cli, which sends lyrics straight into your terminal.

Browser Mode¶

SwagLyrics also has an option to display lyrics in a browser tab, in case you want to multitask like that or something. You can do that by passing the -t flag:

$ swaglyrics -t

All Arguments¶

usage: swaglyrics [-h] [-t] [-c] [-n]

Either the tab or cli argument is required to output lyrics.

Arguments:

-h, --help

show this help message and exit

-t, --tab

Display lyrics in a browser tab.

-c, --cli

Display lyrics in the command-line.

-n, --no-issue

Disable issue-making on cli.

SwagLyrics for Spotify
